an5.80:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, anagatabhayani etarahi asamuppannani ayatim samuppajjissanti.
an5.80:2.2: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam civare kalyanakama.
an5.80:2.3: Te civare kalyanakama samana rincissanti pamsukulikattam, rincissanti arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani;
an5.80:2.4: gamanigamarajadhanisu osaritva vasam kappessanti, civarahetu ca anekavihitam anesanam appatirupam apajjissanti.
an5.80:2.5: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.80:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam pindapate kalyanakama.
an5.80:3.2: Te pindapate kalyanakama samana rincissanti pindapatikattam, rincissanti arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani;
an5.80:3.3: gamanigamarajadhanisu osaritva vasam kappessanti jivhaggena rasaggani pariyesamana, pindapatahetu ca anekavihitam anesanam appatirupam apajjissanti.
an5.80:3.4: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.80:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam senasane kalyanakama.
an5.80:4.2: Te senasane kalyanakama samana rincissanti rukkhamulikattam, rincissanti arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani;
an5.80:4.3: gamanigamarajadhanisu osaritva vasam kappessanti, senasanahetu ca anekavihitam anesanam appatirupam apajjissanti.
an5.80:4.4: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.80:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam bhikkhunisikkhamanasamanuddesehi samsattha viharissanti.
an5.80:5.2: Bhikkhunisikkhamanasamanuddesehi samsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etam patikankham:
an5.80:5.3: ‘anabhirata va brahmacariyam carissanti, annataram va sankilittham apattim apajjissanti, sikkham va paccakkhaya hinayavattissanti’.
an5.80:5.4: Idam, bhikkhave, catuttham anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.80:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam aramikasamanuddesehi samsattha viharissanti.
an5.80:6.2: Aramikasamanuddesehi samsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etam patikankham:
an5.80:6.3: ‘anekavihitam sannidhikaraparibhogam anuyutta viharissanti, olarikampi nimittam karissanti, pathaviyapi haritaggepi’.
an5.80:6.4: Idam, bhikkhave, pancamam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.80:7.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca anagatabhayani etarahi asamuppannani ayatim samuppajjissanti.
